testcase.classname: Login functionality for Adactin web application
testcase.name: Verify booking itinerary is reflecting the correct information in booking confirmation page

should verify the Welcome to AdactIn Group of Hotels is displayed in the login page.passed When User enters the username in the login page.............................passed And User enters the seconds...............................................passed When User select the location using drop down '"Sydney"'....................passed And User select the hotel creep using drop down '"Hotel Creek"'.............passed And User select the room type using drop down '"Standard"'..................passed And User select the no of rooms using drop down '2'.........................passed And page..................passed And User clicks the continue button in the hotel search page................passed And User waits for '3' seconds..............................................passed When User enters first name.................................................passed And User enters last name...................................................passed And User enters billing
